properties.description: The most advanced distribution system of NDB Cluster, by Mikael Ronström the inventor of NDB Cluster; made to work for the most advanced ML applications.
properties.og:title: RonDB - World's fastest Key-Value Store
properties.og:description: The most advanced distribution system of NDB Cluster, by Mikael Ronström the inventor of NDB Cluster; made to work for the most advanced ML applications.

content:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6013cab68382f702f5481fa8/6013cab6837af23632f1fe1c_menu-icon.png)
[](https://www.rondb.com/)
[About](https://www.rondb.com/about)[Github](https://github.com/logicalclocks/rondb)[Blog](https://www.rondb.com/blog)[Benchmark](https://www.rondb.com/benchmark-rondb-the-fastest-key-value-store-on-the-cloud)
Resources
[Community](https://community.rondb.com/)[Downloads](https://www.rondb.com/downloads)[Docs](https://docs.rondb.com/)[Bugs](https://github.com/logicalclocks/rondb/issues)
[Contact](https://www.rondb.com/)
The world's **fastest** **key value store** is now in the cloud.
Powering the world's most advanced and fastest feature store; [Hopsworks](https://www.hopsworks.ai/the-python-centric-feature-store?utm_source=internal&utm_medium=rondb&utm_id=backlink)
**RonDB** as a managed version provides advanced technology with a user friendly interface. You can launch a cluster in less than a minute. Scales to **hundreds of million of operations per second**. There are no other existing managed databases available today that can do this.
## **Scale-Out**
Scales linearly with mores CPUs on a single host and/or scale-out by adding new data nodes.
## **Battle tested**
An open-source distribution of NDB Cluster by Mikael Ronström, the inventor of NDB Cluster. 
## **Fastest**
Throughput of up to hundreds of millions of read or write ops/seconds and <1ms latency for individual operations.
## **SQL Support**
Access using the MySQL Server API for full compatibility with SQL. Native support for parallelizing queries.
![LATS diagram](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6013cab68382f702f5481fa8/6034ee493af24635ef60fb45_venn-04.png)
## **The first LATS databasein the cloud.**
RonDB has dedicated support for features required for a high performance online feature store, including **LATS** : low **L** atency, high **A** vailability, high **T** hroughput, scalable **S** torage. RonDB is built with online feature stores in mind providing key capabilities that are unmatched.‍**< 1ms KV lookup>10M KV Lookups/sec>99.999% availability **
[Learn More](https://www.rondb.com/about)
